item.title: Step 1. Create a new XContext instructorsCtx.bucx
item.description: Create a new XContext named "instructorsCtx.bucx" using the New File wizard.

item.title: Step 2. Set the content of instructorsCtx.bucx
item.description:
Set the content of "instructorsCtx.bucx" as follows.
context instructorsCtx
extends membersCtx coursesCtx
constants INSTR instrs
axioms
@axm1_3: "INSTR ∈ ℙ(MEM)"
@axm1_4: "instrs ∈ CRS → INSTR"
end

item.title: Step 3. Auto-format the code
item.description: Automatically format the content of "intructorsCtx.bucx" by using short-cut (e.g., on Mac OS: Cmd+Shift+F).
